::Ramhorn::

Between shots at Megatron, Ramhorn activates his comm-link, "Megatron decided 
to pay us a little visit. He blew up the Ark, but something reversed the 
explosion. I'm currently shooting at him," he ends the transmission, firing 
another shot at Megatron.
